message: Thanks! I registered. What day(s) anybody going? I put my position as R&D. Hope that's acceptable. "hacker" wasn't in the drop-down menu.
I'll be there Wednesday. Makes more sense.
Wait - I registered for free. What's the promo code for?
I used the code and the end of registering it listed that the badge was free but listed "$55 on-site registration".
Was it good? I'm going tomorrow. Will I see any familiar faces? Any Booth/Exhibit recommendations?
I was there today.  I was also at the Cloud computing expo too.
I talked to a guy who makes material for the F-35 JSF - most expensive aircraft to date. He gave me a sample of the super stealth plane's wing material.
